synopsis.text:
June 2022, what began as an April Fools' Day prank transformed into a thrilling reality during Day 2 of the 'Aqours 6th LoveLive! ~KU-RU-KU-RU Rock 'n' Roll TOUR~' Tokyo dome concert. The beloved school idol, Yoshiko Tsushima, known for her adolescent delusions of grandeur, is reimagined as a magical girl in this captivating spin-off of "Love Live! Sunshine!!"

Set against the picturesque backdrop of Numazu, a charming coastal town embraced by the sea and mountains, the story unfolds around Yohane, a young girl who has always felt out of place amidst her fellow townsfolk. Her dreams and destiny lie beyond the confines of this quaint town, waiting to be discovered in the vast world outside.

Join Yohane, a rule-breaker by nature, as she embarks on a mystical journey to uncover her true potential and purpose. Streamed a week in advance on ABEMA starting June 25th, 2023, and officially aired on July 2nd, 2023, this enchanting tale promises to captivate audiences with its unique blend of magic, self-discovery, and the power of friendship.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
